#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define double         long double
#define ll             long long
#define pi             pair <int,int>
#define pl             pair <ll,ll>
#define ps             pair <string,string>
#define vi             vector <int>
#define vl             vector <ll>
#define vpi            vector <pi>
#define vpl            vector <pl>
#define st             string
#define vs             vector <st>
#define f(i,a,b)       for(ll i=(a);i<(b);i++)
#define fd(i,a,b)      for(ll i=(a);i>(b);i--)
#define Max(a,b)       ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define Min(a,b)       ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
#define x              first
#define y              second
#define si(a)          scanf("%d",&a)
#define sii(a,b)       scanf("%d %d",&a,&b)
#define siii(a,b,c)    scanf("%d %d %d",&a,&b,&c)
#define sl(a)          scanf("%lld",&a)
#define sll(a,b)       scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b)
#define slll(a,b,c)    scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&a,&b,&c)
#define ss(s)          scanf("%s",s)
#define pf             printf
#define pfi(n)         printf("%d\n",n)
#define pfl(n)         printf("%lld\n",n)
#define pfls(n)        printf("%lld ",n)
#define pfci(n,ans)    printf("Case %lld: %d\n",n,ans)
#define pfcl(n,ans)    printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",n,ans)
#define pfcd(n,ans)    printf("Case %lld: %lf\n",n,ans)
#define pb             push_back
#define all(v)         v.begin(),v.end()
#define mem(a,v)       memset(a,v,sizeof(a))
#define INF 1e6
#define MAX  5007
#define MOD 1000000007
#define LG  16
#define mid ((l+r)/2)
#define PI acos(-1.0)

using namespace std;

ll nCr[MAX][MAX];
ll par[MAX][MAX];

int main(){
    mem(par,0);
    f(i,0,MAX){
        f(j,0,MAX){
            if(j>i) nCr[i][j]=0;
            else if(j==0 || j==i) nCr[i][j]=1;
            else nCr[i][j]=(nCr[i-1][j]+nCr[i-1][j-1])%MOD;
        }
    }
    f(j,1,MAX){
        f(i,1,MAX){
            par[i][j]=(par[i-1][j]+nCr[i-1][j-1])%MOD;
        }
    }
    ll T;
    sl(T);
    f(t,1,T+1){
        ll N;
        sl(N);
        ll co=1;
        ll ans=0;
        f(i,1,N+1){
            if(i==1) co*=26;
            else co*=25;
            co%=MOD;
            ll tmp=(par[N][i]*par[N][i])%MOD;
            ans=(ans+co*tmp)%MOD;
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
}
